[00:00.00]Gravity(feat. Tyler, The Creator) (Explicit) - Brent Faiyaz/DJ Dahi/Tyler, The Creator
[00:01.13]Lyrics by：Christopher Wood/Dacoury Natche/Tyler Okonma/Steve Lacy
[00:02.00]Composed by：Christopher Wood/Dacoury Natche/Tyler Okonma/Steve Lacy
[00:02.66]Brent Faiyaz：
[00:02.70]One-two one-two
[00:06.78]Yeah
[00:07.06]I'm on
[00:09.41]But you want me home
[00:11.25]Yeah
[00:12.38]I'd get you what you want
[00:14.32]Ooh
[00:15.06]But you want me alone
[00:16.62]I'm gone baby I'm active
[00:18.00]You held me up when I was down and out
[00:21.81]But I don't want you waitin' 'round for me
[00:25.94]She hold me down
[00:26.60]I don't want you waitin' too long
[00:28.91]She hold me down
[00:32.27]I don't want you waitin' too long
[00:33.73]Yeah yeah
[00:34.05]She hold me down like gravity we on the front page of them blogs
[00:37.80]Would you be mad at me
[00:38.93]If the whole world knew the s**t we was on
[00:40.64]It would be tragedy my n***as be globe-trottin' like travel teams
[00:43.98]You always in my travel dreams
[00:45.97]Lace up to Three Stripes and I'm gone but you just want me home
[00:49.63]Shorty hit my jack like "What the f**k you doin'"
[00:51.75]B***h I'm all alone
[00:52.78]She hold me down
[00:53.44]You gon' press me now
[00:55.26]Is you gon' stress me out and cuss me out
[00:57.47]I had my fair share of women feelings don't catch me now
[00:59.78]Down
[00:59.94]I'm on
[01:00.43]Don't act like I'm average come on
[01:02.84]But you want me home
[01:03.74]Home
[01:05.00]I'd get you what you want
[01:06.43]Superstar status
[01:07.74]But you want me alone
[01:09.14]I'm gone baby I'm active
[01:10.63]You held me up when I was down and out
[01:14.49]But I don't want you waitin' 'round for me
[01:18.52]She hold me down
[01:19.23]I don't want you waitin' too long
[01:21.69]She hold me down
[01:26.97]It's not that I'm over you not over girl
[01:32.99]Come on
[01:33.30]But I got things to do
[01:36.06]It's too much to be your boyfriend too much
[01:40.09]And you ain't making this much easier
[01:44.56]If I only knew this
[01:47.65]When I used to be your best friend
[01:50.63]You see me blowin' up
[01:52.39]I'm on
[01:53.35]Don't act like I'm average come on
[01:54.89]But you want me home
[01:56.43]Home
[01:57.75]I'd get you what you want
[01:59.16]Superstar status
[02:00.83]But you want me alone
[02:01.94]I'm gone baby I'm active
[02:03.43]You held me up when I was down and out
[02:07.17]But I don't want you waitin' 'round for me
[02:11.26]She hold me down
[02:11.95]I don't want you waitin' too long
[02:14.53]She hold me down
[02:15.75]Tyler/The Creator/Brent Faiyaz：
[02:20.18]Yeah see I'm a star look at me from afar
[02:23.45]Hard to be down to Earth when you nestin' on Mars
[02:26.04]You comet on how I move too much space to assume
[02:28.56]Keep sayin' s**t
[02:29.30]But I'ma tell you the truth s**t
[02:31.16]Now when I'm gone and I roam 'round the globe for three months
[02:34.75]That's too long without somethin' that's sweet
[02:36.99]So I phone little treats that's a snack not a feast
[02:39.77]They don't mean much to me
[02:41.38]'Cause I know that I have a bakery back at home
[02:44.18]Am I wrong for
[02:45.16]Come on f**k
[02:45.84]Brent Faiyaz：
[02:46.17]I'm on
[02:46.48]Don't act like I'm average
[02:47.55]But you want me home
[02:49.19]Home
[02:50.40]I'd get you what you want
[02:51.88]Superstar status

[02:59.82]But I don't want you waitin' 'round for me

data.trans:
[ti:Gravity(feat. Tyler, The Creator) (Explicit)]
[ar:Brent Faiyaz/DJ Dahi/Tyler, The Creator]
[al:Gravity (feat. Tyler, The Creator) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.13]//
[00:02.00]//
[00:02.66]//
[00:02.70]一 二 
[00:06.78]//
[00:07.06]我意乱情迷
[00:09.41]但是你想让我回家
[00:11.25]//
[00:12.38]我会让你如愿以偿
[00:14.32]//
[00:15.06]但是你想让我孤单一人
[00:16.62]我忘乎所以 宝贝 我充满活力
[00:18.00]当我孤独无助时 你帮我振作起来
[00:21.81]但是我不想让你为我等待
[00:25.94]她让我念念不忘
[00:26.60]我不想让你等待太久
[00:28.91]她让我念念不忘
[00:32.27]我不想让你等待太久
[00:33.73]//
[00:34.05]她让我念念不忘 就像地心引力一样吸引着我 我们登上新闻的头版头条
[00:37.80]你会不会生我的气
[00:38.93]如果全世界都知道我们干的事
[00:40.64]那会是一场悲剧 我的兄弟环游世界 就像是旅行团
[00:43.98]你总是出现在我的梦里
[00:45.97]盛装打扮 我忘乎所以 可你只想让我回家
[00:49.63]妹子给我打来电话 说道 你究竟在做什么
[00:51.75]我独自一人
[00:52.78]她让我念念不忘
[00:53.44]现在你对我步步紧逼
[00:55.26]是不是要让我失去理智 对我恶语相向
[00:57.47]我以前有过很多女人 现在感情无法支配我
[00:59.78]沉浸其中
[00:59.94]我意乱情迷
[01:00.43]不要装得好像我是普通人一样 来吧
[01:02.84]但是你想让我回家
[01:03.74]踏上归途
[01:05.00]我会让你如愿以偿
[01:06.43]超级巨星的地位
[01:07.74]但是你想让我孤单一人
[01:09.14]我忘乎所以 宝贝 我充满活力
[01:10.63]当我孤独无助时 你帮我振作起来
[01:14.49]但是我不想让你为我等待
[01:18.52]她让我念念不忘
[01:19.23]我不想让你等待太久
[01:21.69]她让我念念不忘
[01:26.97]这并不是说我已经忘记你 还没有结束 女孩
[01:32.99]来吧
[01:33.30]但是我有正事要做
[01:36.06]成为你的男朋友已经超出我的承受范围
[01:40.09]可你不会让这一切变得易如反掌
[01:44.56]如果我只知道这些就好了
[01:47.65]当我以前是你的好朋友时
[01:50.63]你看见我名声大噪
[01:52.39]我意乱情迷
[01:53.35]不要装得好像我是普通人一样 来吧
[01:54.89]但是你想让我回家
[01:56.43]踏上归途
[01:57.75]我会让你如愿以偿
[01:59.16]超级巨星的地位
[02:00.83]但是你想让我孤单一人
[02:01.94]我忘乎所以 宝贝 我充满活力
[02:03.43]当我孤独无助时 你帮我振作起来
[02:07.17]但是我不想让你为我等待
[02:11.26]她让我念念不忘
[02:11.95]我不想让你等待太久
[02:14.53]她让我念念不忘
[02:15.75]//
[02:20.18]你瞧 我是明星 在远处遥望我
[02:23.45]当你找到心之所属时 你再也无法将就
[02:26.04]如彗星一般与我擦肩而过 我们之间相隔甚远
[02:28.56]不停地胡言乱语
[02:29.30]但是我会告诉你真相
[02:31.16]当我离开以后 我满世界奔波了三个月
[02:34.75]我已经很久没有体会到爱情的甜蜜滋味
[02:36.99]所以我打来电话 聊以慰藉 这只是点心不是盛宴
[02:39.77]他们对我来说毫无意义
[02:41.38]因为我知道我会重温旧梦
[02:44.18]我是否做错了
[02:45.16]来吧 尽情放纵
[02:45.84]//
[02:46.17]我意乱情迷
[02:46.48]不要装得好像我是普通人一样
[02:47.55]但是你想让我回家
